answers.answer: Hi there.  I went to the doctor rather than trying to treat it myself.  The over the counter remedies don't always cut it.  I was given an oral tablet to combat it that worked for me.    Have you been to your doctor?
Do you have diabetes? If not please go get checked for them, as diabetes bring on recurrent yeast infections
hi. i already went to the doctor and with specialist, did diabetic exam and another several more, take pills and all what doctors said and nothing works

question: hi, does anybody has experience with recurrent candida's infection?  How do you treat it? ?
title: Recurrent Vaginal Candida
